attributes.action: create new bank holiday- VOLDEMORT DEFEATED DAY - on 2nd of May
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To celebrate not only the epic work of Ms JK Rowling in Telling the Tale, but the defeat of The Dark Lord and his minions by Mr H Potter and co, 

we call upon the Muggle Prime Minister to create a new bank holiday, yearly, on the 2nd of May.

This would pay tribute not only to those who died, but also celebrate  the triumph of Good Over Evil, freedom of speech, freedom of movement, unity, tolerance and understanding between all  humans (magical and non magical),  half breeds, and magical creatures.
(Also to ensure correct pronunciation of  Voldemort- ie not with a 't' at the end).

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
